title Sequence Diagram: 18 Buy Tickets

actor "User" as u
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as w

boundary "<link:_>newView : View" as nv
boundary "<link:_>newView2 : View2" as nv2

boundary "<link:_>: DispatchServlet" as d

entity "<link:_>model : Model" as m

control "<link:_>: EventController" as tc

entity "<link:_>t : Ticket" as t
participant "<link:_>: EventService" as es

participant "<link:_>: EventRepository" as tr
participant "<link:_>: UserRepository" as ur

entity "<link:_> u:User" as us
entity "<link:_>e: Event" as e
== 1. The user selects options like date, time, price, ticket quantity ==


u -> w: click()

w -> d: POST(url: String, data: JSON)
activate d

d -> tc:buyTicket(eId: long, ticketType: TicketType, ticketNum: int, m: Model)

activate tc

tc -> es: getAvailableTicketsNumber(eId: long, ticketType: TicketType, ticketNum: int)


activate es
es -> tr: e:=findEventByEventId(eId: long)
alt ticketType = STANDING
    es -> e: true:=checkStandingNumberAvailable(ticketNum: int)
else ticketType =SEATING
    es -> e:true:=checkSeatingNumberAvailable(ticketNum: int)
else ticketType =PREMIUM
es -> e:true:==checkPremiumNumberAvailable(ticketNum: int)
end

es --> tc: return Error.NONE
deactivate es

tc -> es:getEvent(eId: long)
activate es
es -> tc:e
deactivate es
tc -> m: addAttribute("event": String, e: Event)

tc --> d: return "buy-tickets" **(10-buy-tickets)**
deactivate tc
d -> *nv:View(m: Model)
activate nv

nv --> d:
deactivate nv

d --> w: return newView
deactivate d


==2. The system notifies the user that tickets are currently available ==

note over w,d:This part of the functionality is completed in Javascript\nIt does not need to be shown here


==3. If tickets are available, the user can click the "Pay" button to make a purchase==
u -> w: click()

w -> d: POST(url: String, data: JSON)
activate d

d -> tc: buyTicket(accountId: long, eId:long, ticketType: TicketType, ticketNum: int, m: Model)
activate tc

tc -> es:buyTicket(accountId: long, eId: long,  ticketType: TicketType, ticketNum: int)

activate es
es -> e: e:= getEvent(eId: long)
es -> us: u := getUser(accountId: long)

loop Go through the process ticketNum times.
es -> *t: Ticket(u: User, e: Event , ticketType: TicketType)
activate t
t -->es:return ticket
deactivate t


es -> tr: reduceTicketNumble(ticketType: TicketType)
es -> tr:save(e: Event)
es -> ur: addTicket(ticket: Ticket)

es -> ur:save(u: User)
end
es -->tc:return Ticket[*]
deactivate es

tc -> m: addAttribute("tickets":String, tickets: Ticket[*])
tc --> d: return "ticket - details" **(11-check-tickets)**  
deactivate tc

d -> *nv2:View(m: Model)
activate nv2

nv2 --> d:
deactivate nv2
d --> w: return newView
deactivate d

==4. see the Ticket Details Page **(11-check-tickets)** ==
